title: What are some songs that have meaningful lyrics (pop, R&B, ballad, soul, etc.)? - Quora

response.answer_text: Since I’m a 70’s child, I’m biased to its music. There are a plethora of one hit wonders and incredible albums that are so deep… Ricki Lee Jones (self-titled, et al), Joni Mitchell’s Court and Spark, Earth Wind & Fire, Blondie, Little Feat, Tower of Power, later James Brown, Jackson Browne (not funky, but love his voice), Chicago, etc. That is the short list… Enjoy the journey… Best, Evan J. www.evanj31drum.com
